DOC.brief_summary: The effect of Steep Trendelenburg position used during laparoscopic surgery on intraocular pressure during surgery and on the retinal nerve fiber thickness after surgery
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Steep Trendelenburg in Laparoscopic Surgery on IOP & RNFL Thickness
DOC.detailed_description: To measure IOP and RNFL thickness in subjects undergoing laparoscopic operations in steep trendelenburg before, during, and after the operation
DOC.criteria: SUBJECTS INTENDING TO UNDERGO LAPROSCOPIC SERGURY WHICH HAVE NO EYE DISEASES SUBJECT WITH EYES DISEASE PREGNANCY DURING THE STUDY PERIOD
